程序包 modele

类 Compteur

java.lang.Object
modele.Compteur
所有已实现的接口:
Visitor
public class Compteur
extends java.lang.Object
implements Visitor

The class Compteur implements interface Visitor and we use this class to calculate the points of Player

从以下版本开始:
15 December 2020
版本:
1.0
作者:
Wang Taojun

    修饰符和类型 方法 说明
    int compte​(Desk desk, Card victorycard)
    Calculate points in the map by victorycard of player.Calculate scores by row and by column
    int comptecollonnecolor​(Desk desk, Card victorycard)
    Calculate scores by column and colour of victoeycard
    int comptecollonnefilled​(Desk desk, Card victorycard)
    Calculate scores by column and filled
    int comptecollonneshape​(Desk desk, Card victorycard)  
    int comptelignecolor​(Desk desk, Card victorycard)
    Calculate scores by ligne and colour
    int comptelignefilled​(Desk desk, Card victorycard)
    Calculate scores by ligne and filled
    int compteligneshape​(Desk desk, Card victorycard)
    Calculate scores by line and shape of victorycard
    static Compteur getInstance()
    Get instance of the Comtpeur

    Implement abstract methods in visit interface
